name: besafehackathon
description: This project template is designed for junior developers aimed at gaining hands-on experience in full-stack development.  This project includes a Node.js server with Express and a React client (powered by Vite), providing an opportunity to engage in frontend development, backend development, and API integration. Specifically the template is a full-stack MERN application for managing a library of rubber ducks - but you can modify it and build a library application of your choice.
